snippet: California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes winner; Bayern, the Breeders’ Cup Classic winner; and Main Sequence, the Breeders’ Cup Turf winner, are the finalists for horse of the year at the Eclipse Awards.
abstract: California Chrome, Bayern and Main Sequence are finalists for horse of year at Eclipse Awards.
lead_paragraph: California Chrome, the Kentucky Derby and Preakness Stakes winner; Bayern, the Breeders’ Cup Classic winner; and Main Sequence, the Breeders’ Cup Turf winner, are the finalists for horse of the year at the Eclipse Awards.

headline.main: Eclipse Finalists Include California Chrome and Bayern
headline.print_headline: Eclipse Finalists Include California Chrome and Bayern
